house_listing.house_description: This lovely historic district home was remodeled in september, 1995. Features oak floors, crown moldings, corner cabinets, ceramic tile baths.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Living Room

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Nook, Cable TV, Dishwasher, Dryer, Hardwood Flooring,Microwave, Traditional Style
